quote: Even after she was gone, he passed her place each day: something white in a high window - not a face,but the white belly of a pigeon beating its wingsagainst the pane in the boarded-up house.
quote_letters: EVEN AFTER SHE WAS GONE HE PASSED HER PLACE EACH DAY SOMETHING WHITE IN A HIGH WINDOW - NOT A FACEBUT THE WHITE BELLY OF A PIGEON BEATING ITS WINGSAGAINST THE PANE IN THE BOARDED-UP HOUSE
